          <title>
            <string language="en">Homolytic fission of hydrogen chloride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Homolytische Spaltung der 
Wasserstoffchlorverbindung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fission homolytique de chlorure d'hydrogène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fission homolytic do cloreto de hidrogênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fissione omolitica dell'acido cloridrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Homolytic διάσπαση του υδροχλωρίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fisión homolítica del cloruro de hidrógeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations showing the dot-and-cross diagram for homolytic fission of compounds. Shown here is the diagram for hydrogen chloride.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bond breaking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">covalent bond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dot-and-cross diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">free radicals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">homolytic fission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die das 
Punkt-und-Kreuz Diagramm für homolytische Spaltung der Mittel zeigen.
Hier gezeigt das Diagramm für Wasserstoffchlorverbindung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations montrant le 
diagramme de point-et-croix pour la fission homolytique des composés.
Montré ici est le diagramme pour le chlorure d'hydrogène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostram o 
diagrama da ponto-e-cruz para o fission homolytic dos compostos. 
É mostrado aqui o diagrama para o cloreto de hidrogênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che mostrano 
lo schema della puntino-e-traversa per fissione omolitica dei residui.
È indicato qui lo schema per l'acido cloridrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν 
σημείο-και-διαγώνιο διάγραμμα για την homolytic διάσπαση των 
ενώσεων. Εμφανισμένο εδώ είναι το διάγραμμα για το 
υδροχλώριο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que muestran el 
diagrama de la punto-y-cruz para la fisión homolítica de compuestos.
Se muestra aquí el diagrama para el cloruro de hidrógeno.</string>
          </description>
